page.title: 08Hymn Singing
page.content: A{Gymanfa ganu}is a{Welsh hymn singing {festival.}This year the eight welsh schools which feed{Llanhari Welsh {comprehensive school}met on the 27th of June at Salem,{Pencoed}for a Gymanfa which was enjoyed by us all. We arrived there by bus and there was a man called Mr. Evans outside the chapel telling us where to go. We went up a small staircase with a red carpet then we were on the balcony with over 400 other children. There were sopranos on one side and altos on the other side. There were 9 new hymns to learn and we knew all the words by heart. We enjoyed the Gymanfa very much, we behaved well and we made many new friends.
